attributes.action: abolish car tax, increase fuel duty to compensate. Replace the tax disc with an MOT disc...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish car tax, increase the fuel duty to compensate, meaning no more tax dodging! Save revenue from chasing tax dodgers.
Replace the tax disc with an MOT disc, isued instead of an MOT certificate, and produced only with an insurance certificate, allowing authorities to remove unsafe/uninsured cars from the road.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
